Text: Convenient and CostEffective Way To Earn Participatory MCLECelesq a premier provider of CLE has a widevariety of programs approved by the State Bar of Texas for selfstudy and Participatory CLE credit Celesq also offers numerous additional programs for selfstudy credit Click here to view andor purchase individual programs indexaspcatview If you prefer to view or listen to programs on tape Alamo Subscription members can obtain CLE programs on videotape or audiotape for an additional flat fee per program Purchase the Alamo Subscription by November for only and receive unlimited online access to our CLE program catalog through December Click here indexaspcat Programs are available You can take programs on your schedule at your own pace Programs can be taken online in streaming audio andor video You can download and print the course text for many of our programs Courses are available in audiotape and videotape format For a listing of our participatory and selfstudy online MCLE programs or to purchase the Alamo Subscription call us at or visit our website at wwwcelesqcomTXmcle This email was sent to If you have received this email in error or wish unsubscribe please go to indexaspcatEmailRemoval Please allow business days for your request to take effect
